entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
